entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
